'''''CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter''''' was the official [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]] newsletter, edited by James Kight.

==Issues==
* #1 published June 1998 (interview with [[Mike Reynolds]])
* #2 published [[24 August|August 24]], 1998 (interview with [[Audrey Corman]])
* #3 published September 1998 (interview with [[Liz Danforth]])
* #4 published January 1999 (interview with [[Coleman Charlton]])
* #5 published August 1999 (interview with [[Angelo Montanini]])
* #6 published October 1999 (interview with [[Donato Giancola]])
